product_name: Topo Athletic M-RX Training Shoes - Men's
long_description: Great for tough workouts on the road or in the gym, the Topo Athletic M-RX men's training shoes feature a split-toe, zero-drop design for a natural, low-profile fit that feels like second skin. Split-toe design creates a unique anchor point in the forefoot, offering a snug fit; open toe box allows the remaning toes to spread naturally for comfort and optimal feel. Lace closure plus rip-and-stick forefoot strap allow a custom fit. 0mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a midfoot/forefoot strike, reducing heel strike impact and braking. Ultralight mesh uppers with microfiber overlays provide excellent breathability and just the right amount of structure. Welded seam construction reduces weight as well as chafing and irritation against skin. Removable EVA footbed provides cushioning and odor resistance. Durable rubber outsoles on the Topo Athletic M-RX men's training shoes offer reliable traction on a variety of surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
